summary_plants.content: Leafy plants are good food for lots of bugs.

summary_flowers.content: Flowers have a watery juice inside called nectar.
I wonder what animals will drink it!

summary_ant.content: They work together to collect leaves
to take back to their nests.

summary_aphid.content: Aphids are very small and can move quickly.

summary_bumble_bee.content: Bumblebees move pollen from one flower to another.

summary_centipede.content: I wonder where we will find them?

summary_grasshopper.content: Grasshoppers get around by jumping - and flying!
I wonder what other ways bugs can move around?

summary_honey_bee.content: food is in a special way.

summary_hummingbird.content: The ruby throated hummingbird is a small bird
that flaps its wings very fast.
It can fly around from spot to spot very quickly!

summary_ladybug_larvae.content: These are larva or baby ladybugs.
How will they need to change to be adult ladybugs?

summary_ladybug.content: The ladybug is now an adult!
It has a red shell with spots on it.

summary_mantis_nymph.content: This is a nymph or a baby praying mantis.
I wonder how it will change as it grows?

summary_mantis.content: It looks similar to when it was a nymph,

summary_monarch_caterpillar.content: Caterpillars are the baby form of butterflies.
I wonder what colors and patterns this butterfly will have?

summary_monarch_butterfly.content: The Monarch Caterpillar we added changed
into this orange and black butterfly!

summary_robin.content: Sometimes the robin bird hops along the

summary_rolypoly.content: I wonder where we'll see them!

summary_shrike.content: The shrike bird gets its food
by sitting up high, spotting it,
and quickly diving down to catch it.

summary_skink.content: for food in the plants and trees.

summary_snail.content: Snails crawl slowly across the ground

summary_snake.content: The green snakeâ€™s color helps it
to blend in with the leaves on bushes and trees.

summary_spider.content: Orb weaver spiders build webs of strong,
thick silk to catch other bugs to eat.

summary_swallowtail_caterpillar.content: I wonder what colors this butterfly will be?

summary_tiger_beetle_larvae.content: The tiger beetle larva hunts for food
then catching other bugs when they come near. I wonder what it will eat?

summary_tiger_beetle.content: This is the adult Tiger Beetle.
How has it changed since it was a larva?

summary_worm.content: Earthworms make tunnels by eating the soil.
